name: 环形杀手 Circle Killer
description:
This is a music action game that combines multiple gameplay attempts
Introduction
In the game, you will play the role of 'Yuan', avoiding blocks in different levels, surviving for a certain time or achieving specific conditions to achieve victory
At present, the levels in the game have different operating skills, including "time dilation", "time stop", "time travel", etc
The above abilities will also undergo corresponding changes in different levels.
The current levels are all randomly generated through certain algorithms, and each time you play, you can have a different experience
Art style
The game uses a unified style of Cyber Neon and Steam Wave
It is also called "light pollution", which also means that if you have a series of complications such as "photosensitive epilepsy", discomfort and play this game
Special mechanism
Time dilation - When you use this skill in a specific level, it will slow down the time flow of all objects except your master character. It can help you create time to think about countermeasures, and using this ability will also delay the time count.
Time Stop - This skill can be compared to the DIO ability in JOJO. As the name suggests, this ability is very powerful, but you can also be affected by time stop and pause time counting.
Time and Space Switching - This ability allows you to navigate through different dimensions of time and space while also facing different challenges. Reasonable use of this ability can significantly reduce the difficulty of level experience
